00055 
00088 int uvm_ml_phase::transmit_phase(int                 target_id,
00089                                  const char *        phase_group,
00090                                  const char *        phase_name,
00091                                  uvm_ml_phase_action phase_action)
00092 {
00093     uvm_common_schedule * pschedule = get_schedule(phase_group);
00094     uvm_phase_state       state     = get_phase_state(phase_action);
00095     sc_core::sc_module  * pmod      = NULL;
00096     int                   result    = 1;
00097 
00098     if (uvm_ml_utils::is_tree_node_quasi_static(target_id) == false)
00099         return 1;
00100 
00101     if (is_phase_supported(phase_group, phase_name) == false)
00102         return 1;
00103 
00104     pmod   = uvm_ml_utils::get_quasi_static_tree_node_by_id(target_id);
00105     if(pmod == NULL) {
00106       cout << "UVM_SC adapter: transmit_phase failed, sub-tree not found" << endl;
00107       UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: transmit_phase failed, sub-tree not found","");
00108       return 0;
00109     };
00110     result = pschedule->execute_phase(phase_name, state, pmod);
00111 
00112     return result;
00113 
00114 }   // transmit_phase()
00115 
00116 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00118 
00136 int uvm_ml_phase::notify_phase(const char *        phase_group,
00137                                const char *        phase_name,
00138                                uvm_ml_phase_action phase_action)
00139 {
00140     uvm_common_schedule * pschedule = get_schedule(phase_group);
00141     uvm_phase_state       state     = get_phase_state(phase_action);
00142     int                   result    = 1;
00143 
00144     if (is_phase_supported(phase_group, phase_name) == false)
00145         return 1;
00146 
00147     result = pschedule->execute_quasi_static_phase(phase_name, state);
00148 
00149     if (result && 
00150        (strcmp(phase_name, "connect") == 0)  &&
00151        (state == UVM_PHASE_ENDED) )
00152     {
00153         return uvm_ml_utils::do_pending_uvm_ml_connect_calls();
00154     }
00155 
00156     return result;
00157 
00158 }   // notify_phase()

00160 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00162 
00190 int uvm_ml_phase::notify_runtime_phase(const char *        phase_group,
00191                                        const char *        phase_name,
00192                                        uvm_ml_phase_action phase_action,
00193                                        uvm_ml_time_unit    time_unit,
00194                                        double              time_value,
00195                                        unsigned int *      participate)
00196 {
00197     uvm_common_schedule * pschedule    = get_schedule(phase_group);
00198     uvm_phase_state       state        = get_phase_state(phase_action);
00199     uvm_phase *           pphase       = NULL;
00200     int                   cosim_result = 1;
00201 
00202     (*participate) = 0;
00203 
00204     ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00205 
00206     if (is_phase_supported(phase_group, phase_name) == false)
00207     {
00208         EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00209         return 1;
00210     }
00211 
00212     pschedule->execute_phase(phase_name, state);
00213     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00214 
00215     if (phase_action == UVM_ML_PHASE_EXECUTING)
00216     {
00217         cosim_result = CO_SIMULATION_EXECUTE_DELTA();
00218 
00219         uvm_phase * pphase = pschedule->get_current_phase();
00220         if ((cosim_result == 0) || (pphase->barrier.get_num_barriers() > 0))
00221         {
00222             sc_spawn(sc_bind(&wait_barrier, pphase));
00223             (*participate) = 1;
00224             return 1;
00225         }
00226     }
00227 
00228     return 1;
00229 
00230 }   // notify_runtime_phase
00231

00233 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00235 
00245 void uvm_ml_phase::wait_barrier(uvm_phase* pphase)
00246 {
00247     sc_core::wait(SC_ZERO_TIME);
00248     pphase->barrier.wait();
00249 
00250     sc_core::sc_time current_time  = sc_core::sc_time_stamp();
00251     double           time_sec      = current_time.to_seconds();
00252     unsigned         framework_id  = uvm_ml_utils::FrameworkId();
00253     const char *     phase_name;
00254     const char *     phase_group;
00255 
00256     phase_name  = pphase->get_name().c_str();
00257     phase_group = pphase->get_schedule()->basename();
00258 
00259     (*m_bp_provided_api->notify_phase_done_ptr)(framework_id, phase_group, phase_name, (uvm_ml_time_unit) sc_core::SC_SEC, time_sec);
00260     
00261 }   // wait_barrier()

00264 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00266 
00271 uvm_common_schedule* uvm_ml_phase::get_schedule(const char* phase_group)
00272 {
00273     uvm_common_schedule * pschedule_common = uvm::get_uvm_common_schedule();
00274     uvm_common_schedule * pschedule_uvm    = uvm::get_uvm_schedule();
00275 
00276     if (strcmp(phase_group, "common") == 0)
00277         return pschedule_common;
00278     else
00279         return pschedule_uvm;
00280 
00281 }   // get_schedule()

00286 
00294 bool uvm_ml_phase::is_phase_supported(const char* phase_group, const char*  phase_name)
00295 {
00296     bool bsupported = false;
00297 
00298     if ( (strcmp(phase_group, "common") == 0) &&
00299          ( (strcmp(phase_name, "build") == 0)               ||
00300            (strcmp(phase_name, "connect") == 0)             ||
00301            (strcmp(phase_name, "resolve_bindings") == 0)    ||
00302            (strcmp(phase_name, "end_of_elaboration") == 0)  ||
00303            (strcmp(phase_name, "start_of_simulation") == 0) ||
00304            (strcmp(phase_name, "run") == 0)                 ||
00305            (strcmp(phase_name, "extract") == 0)             ||
00306            (strcmp(phase_name, "check") == 0)               ||
00307            (strcmp(phase_name, "report") == 0)              ||
00308            (strcmp(phase_name, "final") == 0)) )
00309     {
00310         bsupported = true;
00311     }
00312     else if ( (strcmp(phase_group, "uvm") == 0) &&
00313               ( (strcmp(phase_name, "reset") == 0) ||
00314                 (strcmp(phase_name, "configure") == 0) ||
00315                 (strcmp(phase_name, "main") == 0) ||
00316                 (strcmp(phase_name, "shutdown") == 0)) )
00317     {
00318         bsupported = true;
00319     }
00320 
00321     return bsupported;
00322 
00323 }   // is_phase_supported()
00324 
00325 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00327 
00332 uvm_phase_state uvm_ml_phase::get_phase_state(uvm_ml_phase_action phase_action)
00333 {
00334     uvm_phase_state state;
00335 
00336     switch(phase_action)
00337     {
00338     case UVM_ML_PHASE_STARTED:
00339         state = uvm::UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_START;
00340         break;
00341     case UVM_ML_PHASE_EXECUTING:
00342         state = uvm::UVM_PHASE_EXECUTING;
00343         break;
00344     case UVM_ML_PHASE_READY_TO_END:
00345         state = uvm::UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_END;
00346         break;
00347     case UVM_ML_PHASE_ENDED:
00348         state = uvm::UVM_PHASE_ENDED;
00349         break;
00350     default:
00351         break;
00352     };
00353 
00354     return state;
00355 
00356 }   // get_phase_state()
